caption: A group of people gathered around a campfire, engaging in conversation. Then, the view shifted to a room where an old man was writing something on a parchment. Seated beside him was a woman dressed in red, appearing to be a witch. The witch was speaking to the old man, seemingly attempting to enchant him.In another location, a man had been apprehended and stood nearby while a young man interrogated him. The man tried to provoke the young one, but the interrogator remained remarkably composed, though he seemed deeply regretful.
